overview:
Martin Kristiseter spearheads the SmartReply Ad Network. As the Vice President of Ad Network Development, Martin has been instrumental in merging new and old media through mobile advertising, building one of the largest mobile Ad Networks in the country.

Prior to joining SmartReply, Martin founded mSnap, a mobile ad-network that SmartReply acquired in March of 2009. mSnap became the largest provider of mobile marketing and advertising solutions to traditional media companies in the U.S. with over 1,400 media companies under contract.

Martin is a graduate of University of Colorado and received his MBA in 2004. Martin is active in the mobile marketing industry and has been featured on several industry panels, including OMMA, NAB, R&R, and others.
